description: Serve up a flavourful curry with this easy marinade. An impressive meal with minimal prep.
keywords: Korma,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Wheat free,Rice,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Dairy free
name: Easy Chicken Korma Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g brown rice & quinoa infused with lemongrass chilli & garlic

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken and korma paste in a large bowl and toss to coat. Set aside to marinate for 5 minutes.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, for 7 minutes or until browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, vent rice packets and microwave on high for 90 seconds as per packet instructions.
Serve chicken curry on rice with cucumber on the side.
